name: Air Fryer Pork Chops (No Breading)
author: thedailygourmet
summary: The use of an air fryer allows the cook to feed their family fast! You'll need a small round silicone cake pan (6-inch)  available in kitchen supply stores or online.
ingredients: ¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
directions: Combine brown sugar, Worcestershire sauce, soy sauce, lemon juice, garlic, pepper and Sriracha sauce in a small bowl
Preheat an air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) for 2 minutes
Place pork chops in a 6-inch silicone cake pan and pour 1/2 of the brown sugar-soy sauce on top
Transfer the silicone pan to the air fryer basket
Cook in the preheated air fryer for 9 minutes
Turn pork chops and cook for another 9 minutes
Pour remaining sauce on top of pork chops and serve immediately
